name: Form
desc: An optional container for grouping together multiple form field widgets (e.g. [TextField] widgets).

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: onWillPop
fields.desc: Enables the form to veto attempts by the user to dismiss the [ModalRoute] that contains the form.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when one of the form fields changes.

fields.name: autovalidateMode
fields.desc: Used to enable/disable form fields auto validation and update their error text.
